about.title: About me
about.description: Web Development, Sociology and Human Resources. I have never been afraid of anything and I have always been willing to learn. For this reason, after studying a degree in Sociology, a master's degree in Human Resources, and working for a year in Selection and Training departments, I decided to turn my professional career around and study what I was always curious about ... Programming! ! I discovered that Web Development was my thing ... I love creating and this profession allows me to. So what are you waiting for to have me on your team?

description.name: Web Developer
description.description: Since I was little, computers had always been my hobby and after studying Sociology and Human Resources, I decided that it was time to get into that world. Why not? I always liked making web pages of blogs, gifs and I was excited to show them. I made the decision to make my hobby and my day to day my profession. Since I develop the small victories give meaning (and a lot of joy) to the hard work of the day to day, therefore, how can I say that this is not my ideal profession?

description.name: Sociology
description.description: Before becoming a developer and working in Human Resources, I studied Sociology. What better career than the one that let me learn everything I liked? There I learned different things like psychology, statistics, history, economics, urbanism ... In short, sociology. It was four years in which I discovered that I really liked learning and developing projects. That discovery determined my next choice: Human Resources.

description.name: Human Resources
description.description: I decided to study Human Resources, again I gathered different areas that interested me. I developed numerous group projects, which allowed me to work at Deloitte, for the Selection and Training department and at Ayesa for the Selection Department.

description.name: Recruiter in the Selection and Training Department at Deloitte
description.description: In the selection department, I was in charge of the entire selection processes. It was a good way to learn to deal with different types of people. In the training department I was in charge of the preparation and logistics and their subsequent revision.

description.name: Recruiter in the Selection Department at Ayesa
description.description: There I was in charge of analyzing if people could fit in the position that was requested. Then I was in charge of carrying out the selection process.

description.name: Kwnoledges
description.description: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Ecmascript6, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, SQL, Firebase, GIT, Bash, Agile & Scrum, Responsive...

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you are interested in my projects you can visit my github or you want to contact me for any reason you can send me a message
